sentences.en: And you can find the bookshop next to the museum.
sentences.cn: 你就会看到书店在博物馆旁边.

sentences.en: By pure chance he found the rare book he needed in a little second - hand bookshop.
sentences.cn: 纯粹由于偶然的机会,他在一家小旧书店里找到了他所需要的那本难得的书.

sentences.en: Could you tell me the way to the bookshop?
sentences.cn: 你能告诉我去书店的路 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you know where I can find a good bookshop?
sentences.cn: 你知道我在哪里可以找到好书店?

sentences.en: Excuse me, can you show me the way to the bookshop?
sentences.cn: 打扰一下, 你能告诉我去书店的路 吗 ?

sentences.en: He inquired for the book in a bookshop.
sentences.cn: 他在书店中查询那本书.

sentences.en: His friends live above the bookshop.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友们住在书店的楼上。

sentences.en: I got this book by chance at a second - hand bookshop.
sentences.cn: 我赶巧在一家旧书店里买到这本书.

sentences.en: I hit on this book in a small bookshop.
sentences.cn: 我在一家小书店里偶然发现了这本书.

sentences.en: I lit upon a rare book in a secondhand bookshop.
sentences.cn: 我在一家旧书店里偶然发现一珍本书.

sentences.en: I owned a bookshop and desired to expand the business.
sentences.cn: 我拥有一家书店，想要扩大业务。

sentences.en: I want to go to the bookshop.
If you can't do anything on that scale (travel far and wide, or go back to college), you may chose to go to an interesting lecture at a bookshop and come away quite stimulated by what you hear.
sentences.cn: 如果你在这一时期什么也不能做（比如旅行，郊游，读书等），那么你可以选择参加书店里有趣的演讲，你将会听到非常刺激的东西。

sentences.en: In Washington, DC, a normally sophisticated bookshop declares itself “your first stop” for the wedding.
sentences.cn: 在华盛顿，一家久经世故的书店断言自己本身是婚礼的“第一站”。

sentences.en: On hearing that the new novel was published, he rushed at once to the bookshop for a copy.
sentences.cn: 听说那本小说出版了, 他就迫不及待地跑到书店去买.

sentences.en: The bookshop has decided to branch out into selling various records and tapes.
sentences.cn: 书店已决定扩大业务范围,出售各种唱片和录音带.

sentences.en: We'll close that bookshop, and we'll start everything from scratch.
sentences.cn: 我们将把那家书店关掉, 一切从头干起.

sentences.en: With their help we opened a small bookshop.
sentences.cn: 在他们的帮助下,我们开了一家小书店.

sentences.en: You can get this book at any bookshop.
sentences.cn: 在任何书店都买得到这本书.
